summary: Frontend-only testing completed for Gagan A J Portfolio. All P1 bugs and features verified: (1) NO reload loop - page stable for 20+ seconds with HMR disabled in vite.config.js, (2) GitHub Stats shows ONLY streak card (1 card, not 3), (3) Streak stats image loads successfully, (4) Projects section works with refactored data import from /app/frontend/src/data/projects.js - all 6 projects displayed with working filters, (5) WhatsApp button clickable with correct link (+916362475882), (6) Navigation menu fully functional, (7) JSON-LD structured data valid and complete.
critical_code_review_comments: Vite config properly disables HMR (hmr: false, watch: null) to prevent reload loop
GitHubStats.jsx correctly shows only streak card with graceful image error handling
JSON-LD schema is valid with all required Person fields
context_for_next_testing_agent: All P1 issues resolved. Reload loop fixed via HMR disable. GitHub Stats reduced to single streak card. Projects data refactored. JSON-LD validated. All features working.

features_tested.navigation_menu: ✅ PASS - Home, About, Skills, Projects, Contact all work
